MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault.  We are sorry we can't give you a time of restoration at present.  If you wish to call back later we will be able to give you more information.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a fault with the power in the EH48 postcode area of Armadale, affecting properties in Lower Bathville and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 09:41am. Our engineers have arrived in the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.04pm on Thursday 17th December 2020.
